channel.title: UNIX Server Daemon?
channel.description:
I have a UNIX VPS! Nothings wrong with it, it works fine but I have a slight problem. When I boot the server on the VPS by SSH it runs, no problems but when I close the SSH window it closes the server.
How do I run java server as a daemon? I've looked everywhere on the net and haven't been able to find anything useful. I've tried the common && on the end but that hasn't done anything.
Thanks!
I doubt any of this server info is relevant but I'll post the specs and current usage:
OS: centos-5-x86_64 Hostname: BLAH BLAH Main IP: SomeIP
VPS Resource Limits Hard Disk Space: 100gb Guaranteed Ram: 1536mb Burstable Ram: 1536mb CPU Units: 8000 CPU Speed: 2000MHz CPU Cores: 1 Bandwidth: 2000gb
VPS Resource Usage Hard Disk Space: 17.89gb Ram: 518mb Bandwidth: 88759.93gb
